gabriel
Class Group

java.lang.Object
  gabriel.Principal
      gabriel.Group
public class Group
extends Principal

Group THIS IS NOT NEEDED I think. In most (web) applications Users have several roles (principals) like "Editor", "Admin" or may belong to groups (principals) like "Sales", "PR". Very seldom do this roles or groups need to be containers.
